{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of tables set up at table 1, and y be the number of tables set up at table 2. Both x and y are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "3x + 8y \leq 100",
        "5x + 6y \leq 90",
        "2x + 4y \leq 30",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 4x + 5y"
}
